description.value:
You can project your premonitions of clarity to your allies.

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Premonition Of Clarity]{Premonition Of Clarity}, allies within 15 feet of you who failed the same saving throw against the same mental effect can also spend their reactions to reroll the failed saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Shared Clarity]{Effect: Shared Clarity}
